definitions: in a way that evokes interest, attention, or admiration in a powerfully irresistible way

examples.text: this book is beautifully illustrated and compellingly narrated

shortDefinitions: in way that evokes interest, attention, or admiration in powerfully irresistible way

definitions: in a convincing way that is not easily refuted

examples.text: this assumption has never been compellingly demonstrated

shortDefinitions: in convincing way that is not easily refuted
